scripts.test: npm run mocha && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-coffee && npm run build-jade && npm run build-static
scripts.build-clean: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/static && rm -rf js/*
scripts.build-coffee: coffee -co js coffee && uglifyjs js/IO.js js/Qubicle.io.js js/Magica.io.js js/Zoxel.io.js js/Troxel.io.js js/Renderer.js js/Main.js --screw-ie8 -cmeo dist/static/troxel.min.js && npm run build-lib
scripts.build-lib:
uglifyjs js/IO.js js/Troxel.io.js js/Renderer.js js/libTroxel.js --screw-ie8 -cmeo dist/static/libTroxel.min.js && echo '/*!
 * libTroxel (https://github.com/chrmoritz/Troxel)
 * Copyright 2014 Christian Moritz
 * Licensed under GNU LGPL v3.0 (https://github.com/chrmoritz/Troxel/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)
 */' | cat - dist/static/libTroxel.min.js > tmp && mv tmp dist/static/libTroxel.min.js
scripts.build-static: echo 'callback(' > static/Trove.jsonp && cat static/Trove.json >> static/Trove.jsonp && echo ');' >> static/Trove.jsonp && cp -r static dist && mv dist/static/troxel.appcache dist
